a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of maternal deaths by region, 2000 to 2017
A maternal death refers to the death of a woman while pregnant or within 42 days of termination of pregnancy, irrespective of the duration
and site of the pregnancy, from any cause related to or aggravated by the pregnancy or its management but not from accidental or incidental
Data source: World Health Organization (via World Bank)
